title: Channel
description: Set the properties of the channel

station_config_id.title: Station configuration
station_config_id.description: Station configuration to which the channel belongs

Depth.title: Depth
Depth.description: Depth property also used in FDSN Station XML. The depth of the sensor relative to the local ground surface level, in meters

Azimuth.title: Azimuth
Azimuth.description: Azimuth property also used in FDSN Station XML. Azimuth of the component in degrees clockwise from geographic (true) north.

Dip.title: Dip
Dip.description: Dip property also used in FDSN Station XML. Dip of the component in degrees, positive is down from horizontal. For horizontal dip=0, for vertical upwards dip=-90 and for vertical downwards dip=+90.

SampleRate.title: SampleRate
SampleRate.description: SampleRate property also used in FDSN Station XML. Sample rate in samples per second. If not specified, the sample rate of the digitizer will be used on FDSN Station XML.

ClockDrift.title: ClockDrift
ClockDrift.description: ClockDrift property also used in FDSN Station XML. Tolerance value, measured in seconds per sample, used as a threshold for time error detection in data from the channel.

restrictedStatus.title: restrictedStatus
restrictedStatus.description: restrictedStatus property also used in FDSN Station XML.

final_sample_rate.title: Sample rate
final_sample_rate.description: *Readonly* - Sample rate in samples per second. Inherited from digitizer
